scheme_name: Scheme or assistance for Start Ups/ Innovation: Assistance to Startups having a Significant Impact on Society
brief_description: The "Scheme for Assistance for Start Ups/ Innovation" under the Gujarat Industrial Policy, aims to drive economic growth by generating jobs, fostering competition, and introducing next-gen solutions.
detailed_description: The &amp;quot;Scheme for Assistance for Start Ups/ Innovation&amp;quot; is an umbrella scheme launched by the Industries and Mines Department, Gujarat under the Gujarat Industrial Policy. Effective from August 7th, 2020 to August 6th, 2025, it aims to drive economic growth by generating jobs, fostering competition, and introducing next-gen solutions. The component &amp;quot;Assistance to Startups having a Significant Impact on Society&amp;quot;, provides financial assistance to startups that are developing innovative projects with a significant social impact.
benefits: Financial Support: Up to ₹10,00,000/- assistance is provided for innovative projects which have a significant impact on society,
eligibility_criteria: Any individual or group of individuals with an innovative idea or concept, recommended by an approved Nodal Institution, is eligible. The scheme is open to startups in any sector or branch of science, technology, engineering, agriculture, healthcare, etc., making it sector-agnostic. Note: Startups availing benefits under the Student Startup and Innovation Policy (SSIP) are also eligible.

steps: Registration Process: Step 1: Visit the online portal and click on the "Register" button, located at the top right corner. Step 2: Enter Email ID and click on Next button. Verify the details and click on "Submit" to get registered on portal. Step 3: Upon login, fill in the details on Common Application Form. Click on "Sign Up". Application Process: Step 1: Visit the online portal and c lick on Login button. Enter Registered Email ID and Password and click on the "Sign In" button Step 2: In "Dashboard" section fill in all the required details. Step 3: Click on Apply Now Icon located at Dashboard of User. Step 4: From the list Select the Scheme and Fill the Application details.
Block No: 1, 3rd Floor, Udhyog Bhavan, Sector: 11, Gandhinagar - 382010 Gujarat, INDIA.

exclusions: Entities formed by splitting or restructuring an existing business are not considered startups under this scheme. Startups availing benefits under other startup schemes of the Government of Gujarat are ineligible.
documents_required: Pitch presentation with following details: Social issue that a startup intends to address Mission of the startup Vision of the startup Description of product/ service How does it work? Tentative action plan for the next 3-5 years Details of the stakeholders benefited from the social impact generated by the startup Describe measurable social impact generated by the startup. You must support it with photographs, interviews/testimonials of stakeholders/beneficiaries, recognitions or achievements etc. Describe non-measurable social impact generated by the startup. You must support it with photographs, interviews/testimonials of stakeholders/heneficiaries recognitions or achievements etc.  Technical feasibility/ product testing report / certification (if any)  Financial feasibility report / certification (if any)  Evaluation matrix by Nodal Institution  Recommendation form by Nodal Institution (revised format is attached for reference)  Undertaking
